inputs.name: serverEndpoint
inputs.label: StormRunner Load Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the service endpoint for your StormRunner Load server.

inputs.name: tenantid
inputs.label: Tenant Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Your tenant Id, specified in your StormRunner Load URL. For example: https://stormrunner-load.saas.hpe.com/home/?TENANTID=354274891. In this example, the tenant Id is 354274891.

inputs.name: projectid
inputs.label: Project Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Your project Id, specified in your StormRunner Load URL. For example: https://stormrunner-load.saas.hpe.com/home/?TENANTID=354274891&projectId=1. In this example, the project Id is 1.

inputs.name: testid
inputs.label: Test Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Navigate to Load Tests > Overview > General Information to see the test Id.

inputs.name: sendEmail
inputs.label: Send Email
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the checkbox if you want to receive a notification email after the test run is finished.
